titles.title: The Eyes Of The Lord Search To And Fro

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The eyes of the Lord search to and fro,
Throughout the world of our hearts,
Looking for someone
Who longs to live with Him,
In righteousness, in majesty,
With voices raised to sing.
Chorus:
Holy, holy, holy is the Lord.
Holy, holy, holy is the Lord.
(Substitute Worthy and Jesus for Holy.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The heart of the heavenly Father
Seeks in every man
One who will worship in Spirit and truth,
Living their whole life
Surrendered only to Him,
In righteousness, in purity,
With voices raised to sing.
